result.eng: The Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ga: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.orig: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.html: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór cúis na Gaeilge le m'aṫairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.

result.eng: He was very interested in languages.
result.ga: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangacha
result.orig: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangacha
result.html: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangachaHe was very interested in languages.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí suim ṁór aige i dteangaċaHe was very interested in languages.

result.html: Fadhb mhór é seoThis is a big problem.
result.ponchtml: Faḋb ṁór é seoThis is a big problem.

result.ga: Is cathair mhór é Baile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Is cathair mhór é Baile Átha Cliath
result.html: Is cathair mhór é Baile Átha CliathDublin is a big city.
result.ponchtml: Is caṫair ṁór é Baile Áṫa CliaṫDublin is a big city.

result.eng: He is also very interested in Gaelic games.

result.eng: He is also very interested in Gaelic games.

result.eng: I live in number three, High Street, apartment two.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dó
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dó
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí in uimhir a trí Sráid Mhór árasán a dóI live in number three, High Street, apartment two.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí in uiṁir a trí Sráid Ṁór árasán a dóI live in number three, High Street, apartment two.

result.eng: Do you have a lot of children, Séamas?
result.ga: An bhfuil clann mhór agat a Shéamais
result.orig: An bhfuil clann mhór agat a Shéamais
result.html: An bhfuil clann mhór agat a ShéamaisDo you have a lot of children, Séamas?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil clann ṁór agat a ṠéamaisDo you have a lot of children, Séamas?

result.eng: I am not interested in gardening much.
result.ga: Níl aon suim mhór agam sa ngarraíodóireacht
result.orig: Níl aon suim mhór agam sa ngarraíodóireacht
result.html: Níl aon suim mhór agam sa ngarraíodóireachtI am not interested in gardening much.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon suim ṁór agam sa ngarraíodóireaċtI am not interested in gardening much.

result.eng: I live in a big city.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i gcathair mhór
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i gcathair mhór
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i gcathair mhórI live in a big city.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i gcaṫair ṁórI live in a big city.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.orig: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach

result.eng: I have a big interest in it.
result.html: Tá suim mhór agam annI have a big interest in it.
result.ponchtml: Tá suim ṁór agam annI have a big interest in it.

result.ga: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seo

result.html: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.
result.ponchtml: Tá dúil ṁór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.orig: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo

result.ponchtml: Aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige

result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.ga: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.orig: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinne
result.html: A mháthair mhór is tú a chan an fhírinneYou were right, grandma.
result.ponchtml: A ṁáṫair ṁór is tú a ċan an ḟírinneYou were right, grandma.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.

result.eng: Babaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
